meanings.definition: Of great or more than average height.
meanings.sent1: The giraffe is very tall compared to the other animals.
meanings.sent2: She is a tall basketball player and can easily reach the hoop.
meanings.sent3: The tall tree waved its branches in the wind, looking down at the smaller plants.
meanings.sent4: The tall skyscraper stood proudly among the city buildings.
meanings.sent5: The tall mountain peak was covered in snow, glistening in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The tall bookshelf in the corner holds many books.
meanings.sent2: He needs a tall ladder to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent3: The tall fence around the garden kept the rabbits out.
meanings.sent4: The tall clock tower chimed loudly every hour.
meanings.sent5: The tall sunflower in the garden swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.sent1: The flag flew tall in the wind on top of the pole.
meanings.sent2: She stood tall and proud on the winner's podium.
meanings.sent3: The candle burned tall and bright, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent4: The rocket shot tall into the sky, leaving a trail of smoke behind.
meanings.sent5: The tree grew tall and straight towards the sunlight.
